scripts.flush: bash -c '[ -n "$1" ] && [ -n "$2" ] && pnpm tsc && bumper bump "$1" && git add . && git commit -m "$2" && git push || echo "Usage: pnpm flush -- <patch|minor|major> message"' --
scripts.patch: bash -c '[ -n "$1" ] && pnpm tsc && bumper bump patch && git add . && git commit -m "$1" && git push || echo "Usage: pnpm patch -- message"' --
scripts.minor: bash -c '[ -n "$1" ] && pnpm tsc && bumper bump minor && git add . && git commit -m "$1" && git push || echo "Usage: pnpm minor -- message"' --
